attributes.action: I would like for all Male MPs to try the tense mashine
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to try this because they don't acknowledge what women go through on a daily basis and if it were them that suffered from Endometriosis there would be more help and understanding, possibly even a cure. But because it's only females that suffer and they've never had to experience it it doesn't get talked about enough. it's actually shocking that no one turns up to the house of commons when Endometriosis is being discussed
attributes.background: I would like all Male members of Parliament to try the tense mashine to gain some understanding of what women go through while they are on their periods and also gain more insight as to what women with Endometriosis suffer on a daily basis.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about whether to try the tens machines are a matter for individual MPs to decide.
